content:
Diagnosis
	1. Prostate adenocarcinoma T3b N0 M0

	Date of diagnosis
	March 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	None

	Radiotherapy
	Not yet commenced

	Chemotherapy
	Not indicated

	Clinical studies
	PRECISION-RT trial registration completed today

	Current disease status
	Locally advanced disease, no metastases

	Current issues
	Nocturia x3, mild urinary frequency

	Summary of consultation
	[redacted name] attended today for trial registration. Initial prostate biopsy on 15/03/24 showed Gleason 4+4=8 adenocarcinoma involving right base and mid-gland with extracapsular extension. Initial PSA was 28.6. Staging investigations including bone scan 28/03/24 and MRI pelvis 25/03/24 confirm T3b disease with right seminal vesicle involvement but no evidence of metastatic disease.

Molecular testing has identified a pathogenic FANCA mutation which makes him eligible for the PRECISION-RT trial investigating targeted radiotherapy intensification. I have completed a detailed discussion of the trial protocol, including randomisation between standard and intensified radiotherapy doses, additional imaging requirements, and potential side effects. He understands the additional hospital visits required for the research assessments.

He has commenced on Goserelin 10.8mg 12-weekly with first injection given 02/04/24. Trial-mandated baseline assessments including International Prostate Symptom Score, quality of life questionnaires, and PSA have been completed today. Latest PSA has improved to 18.2.

	Further investigations
	Trial-mandated CT planning scan booked for 25/04/24

	Medication prescribed
	Goserelin 10.8mg 12-weekly, next dose due 25/06/24

	Follow up
	Trial baseline MRI 18/04/24
Randomisation clinic 02/05/24
Radiotherapy planned to commence mid-May

	Required GP actions
	Monthly PSA measurements as per trial protocol
Please monitor renal function during hormone therapy

cancer_timeline.value: Prostate biopsy shows Gleason 4+4=8 adenocarcinoma involving right base and mid-gland with extracapsular extension
MRI pelvis confirms T3b disease with right seminal vesicle involvement
Bone scan shows no evidence of metastatic disease
Registered for PRECISION-RT trial investigating targeted radiotherapy intensification

status_updates.value: Newly diagnosed locally advanced prostate cancer. Registered for PRECISION-RT trial with hormone therapy initiated and radiotherapy planned.
Commenced on Goserelin 10.8mg 12-weekly, first dose given 02/04/24
Trial baseline MRI 18/04/24, CT planning scan 25/04/24
Randomisation clinic 02/05/24, radiotherapy planned to commence mid-May
